News.headline: Daggers vs. Braintree Town Hospitality Special
News.page_title: Daggers vs. Braintree Town Hospitality Special
News.URL_keywords: Daggers vs. Braintree Town Hospitality Special
News.short_description: Start the New Year in style with our hospitality special for our Live BT Sport game against Braintree Town on the 2nd January
News.description:
Start off the New Year in style with a special on hospitality packages for our Live BT Sport Vanarama National League fixture against Braintree Town on Monday 2nd January reduced to just £45.00 per person and £25.00 per person for season ticket holders (usually £65.00).

A massive saving is on offer for any fans wanting to carry on the celebration of the holidays into the New Year. The matchday hospitality package includes the following:

·Three course carvery meal
·Complimentary match day programme and team sheet
·Half time refreshments
·Seat in the sponsors box

The game kicks off at 7:45pm with lunch served from 6pm. 

For more information or to make a booking please contact the clubs commercial department on commercial@daggers.co.uk or call 07557921858

Please note that last orders for the hospitality will be at 12:00 on Tuesday, don't miss out!
